paper_metadata.title: Cardiac transplantation in transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy: Outcomes from three decades of tertiary center experience
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Four patients died, including one with ATTRv-CM from complications of leptomeningeal amyloidosis.

individual_records.phenotype_details: No cardiac uptake of Tc-DPD, no evidence of cardiac amyloidosis on CMR over 17 years after CT
individual_records.evidence_sentence: It is notable that patient 2 demonstrated a progressive increase in soft tissue uptake on Tc-DPD scintigraphy post-CT, despite having an allograft EMB that was persistently free from amyloid, no cardiac uptake of Tc-DPD, and no evidence of cardiac amyloidosis on CMR over 17 years after CT.
Patient 10, both of whom had ATTRv-CM were commenced on patisiran 210 months and 6 months post-CT respectively following development of mild ATTR-PN.

functional_data.summary: Functional assays not detailed in the paper.

variants.additional_notes: No specific genomic positions or cDNA notations provided for the variants.
key_quotes: Eleven patients had ATTRwt-CM and the remaining 3 had ATTRv-CM associated with the p.(Val142Ile), p.(Gly73Ala), and p.(Ser43Asn) variants respectively.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
